description: Defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for incoming and outgoing webhooks related to invoices and payments, including request payloads and acknowledgment responses.

classes.name: InvoiceCreatedWebhookRequest
classes.description: DTO for invoice creation webhook request payload.

classes.name: PaymentUpdatedWebhookRequest
classes.description: DTO for payment update webhook request payload.

methods.name: WebhookAckResponse
methods.description: Constructors for the acknowledgment response DTO.
